Interface ICollegeRegistrationSystem

All Known Implementing Classes:
CollegeRegistrationSystem

  • Method Details

    • addFaculty

      Faculty addFaculty(String firstName, String lastName, String emailAddress, Department department, Degree degree)
      Creates a new Faculty from the valid input parameters and adds them to the CollegeMemberRegistry. The pre-conditions are: 1. A valid firstName must be non-null and non-empty. 2. A valid lastName must be non-null and non-empty. 3. A valid email address must be non-null and non-empty. 4. A valid department must be non-null. 5. A valid degree must be non-null.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The first name of the new Faculty
      lastName - The last name of the new Faculty
      emailAddress - The email address of the new Faculty
      department - The department of the new Faculty
      degree - The degree of the new Faculty
      Returns:
      The new Faculty created from the valid input parameters
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the input parameters are invalid

    • addStudent

      Student addStudent(String firstName, String lastName, LocalDate dateOfBirth, String emailAddress, String homeAddress)
      Creates a new Student from the valid input parameters and adds them to the CollegeMemberRegistry. The pre-conditions are: 1. A valid firstName must be non-null and non-empty. 2. A valid lastName must be non-null and non-empty. 3. A valid dateOfBirth is non-null. 4. A valid email address must be non-null and non-empty. 5. A valid home address must be non-null and non-empty.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The first name of the new Student
      lastName - The last name of the new Student
      dateOfBirth - The date of birth of the new Student
      emailAddress - The emaill address of the new Student
      homeAddress - The home address of the new Student
      Returns:
      The new Student created from the valid input parameters
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the input parameters are invalid

    • getCollegeMember

      CollegeMember getCollegeMember(int collegeMemberID) throws CollegeMemberNotFoundException
      Retrieves the CollegeMember with the given ID if they already exist in the CollegeMemberRegistry.
      Parameters:
      collegeMemberID - The ID of the CollegeMember to be retrieved from the CourseRegistry
      Returns:
      The CollegeMember with the given ID if they already exist in the CollegeMemberRegistry
      Throws:
      CollegeMemberNotFoundException - if a CollegeMember with the given ID does not exist

    • getCollegeMemberListing

      Iterator<CollegeMember> getCollegeMemberListing()
      Returns an Iterator over the list of all college members. NOTE) This is applying the Iterator design pattern.
      Returns:
      An Iterator over the list of all college members

    • addCourse

      Course addCourse(String title, int numberOfCredits) throws CourseAlreadyExistsException
      Creates a new Course from the valid input parameters and adds it to the CourseRegistry. The pre-conditions are: 1. A valid title must be non-null and non-empty. 2. A valid numberOfCredits must be non-negative.
      Parameters:
      title - The title for the new Course
      numberOfCredits - The number of credits for the new Course
      Returns:
      The new Course created from the valid input parameters
      Throws:
      CourseAlreadyExistsException - if another course with the same title is already exists in the CourseRegistry
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the input parameters are invalid

    • addCourseSection

      CourseSection addCourseSection(int courseID, int courseSectionEnrollmentCap) throws CourseNotFoundException
      Creates a new CourseSection from the valid input parameters and adds it to the specified Course. The pre-condition is that a valid enrollment cap for the new CourseSection must be a non-negative number.
      Parameters:
      courseID - The ID of the Course to which the new CourseSection belongs
      courseSectionEnrollmentCap - The enrollment cap for the new CourseSection
      Returns:
      The new CourseSection created from the valid input parameters
      Throws:
      CourseNotFoundException - if a Course with the given ID cannot be found in the CourseRegistry
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the input parameters are invalid

    • assignFaculty

      void assignFaculty(int courseID, int courseSectionNum, int facultyID) throws CollegeMemberNotFoundException, CourseNotFoundException, CourseSectionNotFoundException, FacultyOnLeaveException
      Assigns the given Faculty to teach the specified CourseSection.
      Parameters:
      courseID - The ID of the Course which contains the CourseSection to be taught
      courseSectionNum - The section number of the CourseSection which the Faculty has been assigned to teach
      facultyID - The ID of the Faculty assigned to teach the CourseSection
      Throws:
      CollegeMemberNotFoundException - if a Faculty with the given ID cannot be found in the CollegeMemberRegistry
      CourseNotFoundException - if a Course with the given ID cannot be found in the CourseRegistry
      CourseSectionNotFoundException - if a CourseSection with the given section number cannot be found in the Course
      FacultyOnLeaveException - if the Faculty is scheduled to be on leave and cannot teach the CourseSection

    • enroll

      boolean enroll(int courseID, int courseSectionNum, int studentID) throws CollegeMemberNotFoundException, CourseNotFoundException, CourseSectionNotFoundException, CourseSectionFullException
      Enrolls the given Student in the specified CourseSection if that CourseSection is not already full.
      Parameters:
      courseID - The ID of the Course which contains the CourseSection
      courseSectionNum - The section number of the CourseSection in which the Student wants to enroll
      studentID - The ID of the Student wanting to enroll in the CourseSection
      Throws:
      CollegeMemberNotFoundException - if a Student with the given ID cannot be found in the CollegeMemberRegistry
      CourseNotFoundException - if a Course with the given ID cannot be found in the CourseRegistry
      CourseSectionNotFoundException - if a CourseSection with the given section number cannot be found in the Course
      CourseSectionFullException - if the CourseSection is already full and not allowing additional enrollments by Students

    • drop

      boolean drop(int courseID, int courseSectionNum, int studentID) throws CollegeMemberNotFoundException, CourseNotFoundException, CourseSectionNotFoundException
      Drops the given Student from the specified CourseSection if that Student is enrolled in that CourseSection.
      Parameters:
      courseID - The ID of the Course which contains the CourseSection
      courseSectionNum - The section number of the CourseSection to be dropped by the Student
      studentID - The ID of the Student wanting to drop the CourseSection
      Throws:
      CollegeMemberNotFoundException - if a Student with the given ID cannot be found in the CollegeMemberRegistry
      CourseNotFoundException - if a Course with the given ID cannot be found in the CourseRegistry
      CourseSectionNotFoundException - if a CourseSection with the given section number cannot be found in the Course

    • getCourse

      Course getCourse(int courseID) throws CourseNotFoundException
      Retrieves the Course with the given ID if it already exists in the CourseRegistry.
      Parameters:
      courseID - The ID of the Course to be retrieved from the CourseRegistry
      Returns:
      The Course with the given ID if it already exists in the CourseRegistry
      Throws:
      CourseNotFoundException - if a course with the given ID does not exist

    • getCourseListing

      Iterator<Course> getCourseListing()
      Returns an Iterator over all Courses in the CourseRegistry. NOTE) This is applying the Iterator design pattern.
      Returns:
      An Iterator over all Courses in the CourseRegistry
